PIN.values: |LIGHT CHANGE #2&cr;&lf;full LED strip in the color of specific chakra (each sculpture different color)|
|LIGHT CHANGE #3&cr;&lf;all strips together where the light is passed from one sculpture to another|
|LIGHT CHANGE #4&cr;&lf;for example have a green HEART chakra in one sculpture and then to have it in all the other sculptures etc.|
|1 x Kinect 2|,|6 x APA102 LED strips 60pixel/meter&cr;&lf;serially connected in an array of 360 pixels in total|,|1 x Arduino MEGA 2560&cr;&lf;DATA PIN A9 (analog), CLOCK PIN A10 (analog)|
|4 Values that we apply to the pins 9,10,11,12 in Arduino|
|Some Header and End Character to double make sure we get the apropiate packet in Arduino.|
|it is like an unsigned byte from here in arduino|
|LIGHT CHANGE #1&cr;&lf;sometimes just highlighting a specific chakra inside a specific sculpture (considering vertical position and color, just a few single LEDs are on)|
|TOP - Inputs from Kinect 2, triggers&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;|,|MIDDLE - Groups of values for different light changes|,|BOTTOM - Preparation of data for OUTPUT to the Arduino board|
